articles.content: Before his mid-career upswing — starting either with “The Lobster” or “The Beguiled” and running through recent scorchers like “After Yang” and “The Banshees of Inisherin” — it’s worth remembering th… [+7285 chars]

articles.title: Watch The 'Star Trek: Discovery' Season 5 Premiere For Free On YouTube In USA - TrekMovie
articles.description: "Red Directive" available for free on same day it debuts on Paramount+
articles.content: As they do for each new season for all of their shows, Paramount+ has made the entire season 5 premiere of Star Trek: Discovery available online for free. Except this time the did it on the same day … [+1033 chars]
